archimate:DataObject.name: Primary Target Title
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
Either equals the Programme title,
but differs e.g. where different modes of attendance
e.g. BsC Biomedical Science (SW) <--- indicates mode of attendance for a sandwich course
E.g. BsC Hons Biomedical Science (clinical (FT) - fulltime
E.g. BsC Hons Biomedical Science (SW) - sandwich
E.g. BsC Hons Biomedical Science (non clinical)
Sometimes 1:1 Primary Award: Primary Target
Sometimes 1:Many Primary Award: Primary Target
THe name on the student's certificate of the award they got - can have a in brackets name e.g. (blood) - but wouldn't say full time v sandwich
